title: Fabulous hotel for relaxing with your family, even little ones!
text: We spent 4 glorious days at Spier celebrating our 4 year old's birthday. The hotel significantly exceeded our expectations and we ended up spending all of our time at the resort. Our son was spoilt rotten by the hotel for his birthday. The food in the restaurants was exceptional, the pork ribs at Hoghead deserve a particular mention, so good that I them twice. We ordered 2 cases of wine, we enjoyed it so much. We will hopefully go back soon.
